name: Not Todo
description: Not To-Do helps you break bad habits by tracking what not to do. Set reminders, log failed habits, and stay focused with daily nudges to improve your discipline.

name: Pet Assistant
description: Pet Assistant is a smart pet care app under construction—designed to track health, reminders, and records. It’s not ready yet, but perfection takes time (and belly rubs).

name: My Portfolio
description: Welcome to my portfolio—built with Angular and deployed on my home server in a Docker container using Kubernetes for orchestration. Every detail runs under the watchful eye of Datadog for reliability and insight. This site isn’t just a showcase of my work—it is my work, demonstrating real-world deployment, observability, and frontend architecture in action.
